string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: Added Aegis, APK Editor, Bahnhofsfotos, BetterCounter, Bibel+, Binary Eye, Bitwarden, c:geo, Camera Roll, DiskUsage, Dumbphone Assistant, Editor, Elementary, eSpeak, Fennec, GPS JoyStick, HeartBeat, J2ME Loader, KFZ-Kennzeichen, Kiwix, Lemuroid, Librera FD, Mebis, Morse, Mühle, NCalcLibre, NewPipe, ObscuraCam, Öffi Haltestellen, Öffi Netzpläne, Öffi Verbindungen, OpenDocument Reader, OpenTracks, Phone Saver, Pocket Paint, Retouch, Retroboy, Rotation Control, SAI, Shelter, Silence, Smart AutoClicker, SMS Import / Export, Super Retro Mega Wars, Text Fairy, Trail Sense, Transistor, Tutanota, Video Transcoder, VLC, Warden, Warpinator, Weather, WhereYouGo, WireGuard, CubeX, DeepL, Dropbox, Flora Incognita, MiraPlug, ONLYOFFICE Dokumente, Paper copy, Rocketbook, Shazam, SimpleAudio, Snapseed, TCL Connect, Telegram X, VR Media Player, ZArchiver
Added Calculator, Files, Settings, E-Mail, Gallery, Calender, Contacts, Music, PDF eader, Recorder, SMS, phone, clock
Added Aldi Talk (not working), Crossy Road, Zapp, Phyphox
Added Open Camera, Alexa, Google Maps, LineageOS Browser, Disney+, DJI Fly, Firefox, Flix Train

Added Cloudflare, Adguard, Adobe Reader, Apkpure, Authenticator, Birday, Brave, Covpass, Darkland, Discord, Samsung Mail, Files, F-Droid, Gallery, Github, G-Mail, Gutefrage, Homeworker, I-Net Menue, Instagram, Calender, Camera, Keepass, Klocki, Kontakte, Aurora Store, Lucky Patcher, Netflix, Office Suite, Play Games, Amazon Prime Video, Samsung Music, ShapeOminues, Signal, Auto Sketchbook, Sound Assistant, Spingram, Steam, Calculator, Clock, Wallpaper, Whatsapp, Word Mix, Youtube, Youtube Music, ZDF Mediathek, Google Translate, Play Store, Organic Maps, DasDing, Diktiergerät, Google Drive, Google Photos, Messages, Newszone, Smart Things, Samsung Notes, DB Navigator, Amazon Music, Touch Portal, Corona, AMC, Munzee, UAV, Map2Fly
